description: Australian entertainer Rolf Harris is being released from prison in the UK today.
title: Rolf Harris to be released from prison today

author: By Mark Duell
description: The woman claims Rolf Harris, now 87, twice sexually assaulted her when she was 16 years old after an appearance on the Star Games programme in Cambridge in 1978.
title: Rolf Harris 'was nicknamed

description: Rolf Harris is being released from prison in the United Kingdom on bail and will attend the remainder of his trial in person.
title: Rolf Harris to be released from UK prison to attend trial in person

author: By Mark Duell
description: Rolf Harris, 87, has been appearing by videolink at London's Southwark Crown Court, where he is standing trial accused of indecent assault. He will be released from Stafford Prison tomorrow.
title: Rolf Harris, 87, will be released from prison TOMORROW

description: Rolf Harris is to be released from prison on Friday after serving less than three years.
title: Rolf Harris to be released from prison after less than three years and attend his latest trial in person

author: Lucy Pasha-Robinson
description: Rolf Harris is to be released from Stafford Prison on Friday, it has been revealed. The former television star is standing trial accused of indecent assault and had been appearing at Southwark Crown Court via videolink. After his release, the 87-year-old will appear in court in person on bail for the remainder of the trial, which opened on 15 May, Judge Deborah Taylor told jurors.
title: Rolf Harris will be released from prison tomorrow
